## DatasourceOptions.requestAutoSetup property

Whether the Datasource service will setup RQUEST object based on metadata.

**Signature:**

```typescript
requestAutoSetup?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Default is `true`. Only works with REQUEST\_SERVER resources.
